entries.entry: A locked bellhome.
Construct tool?
Lift your voices. Know our grace.

Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.
May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall step within our sacred halls.
A rune-scroll depicting void given form.

Sisters, spiders, watch these waters flow,
Cleansing, Binding, as Silk from shell,
Memories of our kingdom calm.

At the seventh bell toll, send:
Thirty measures, four beats Smokerock,
Eight beats Sweetsmelt,
Mark of fealty, all workers.At the ninth bell toll, send:
Twenty measures, two beats Smokerock,
Seven beats Sweetsmelt,
Mark of fealty, all workers.
High Halls Map
Verdania Map
Underworks Map
When three fonts weep, our sacred shrine shall rise.

Damned are we! The lingered few bound still to suffer. Cursed thrice by Pharloom, to wait, to watch, to cry our anguish.No more! We say! No more! We cry! We all have wailed and wept. Fair Pharloom’s fall has come at last. Its end we now accept.

Litany of the Worker
May we catch the dregs and never tire,
May we clean the dregs and never hunger,
May we spool the dregs and never falter.

Oath of the Whiteward
While song must be sung, none may falter.
Infirmity. Sickness. Death.
All are banished from our Citadel.

Penitent, Fourth of the Fourth.
Guilty of the sins of infirmity, sickness.
Penance by swallowing.
Absolution granted after death.Penitent, Twelfth of the First.
Guilty of an unnamed sin.
Penance by casting.
Absolution not granted.

Penitent, Eighth of the Twelfth.
Guilty of the sin of irreverence.
Penance by chaining.
Absolution granted after death.Penitent, Second of the Fourth.
Guilty of the sin of dissonance.
Penance by silencing.
Absolution granted after death.
Remains of a Muckroach crushed by falling rock.

Anguished Aura
Eight masks hard, swirled soul enraged.
Twelve aknids flat, all juices strained.Six pilgrims living, hung long to drain.
A white lock bearing a surgical symbol.
A rune depicting the Weavenest.
Slab Map
Whispering Vaults Map

Their shells are ours. Their souls are ours.
Our hate is forever.

Containment fails. Memory lost. Excise outer. Maintain inner.
Shellwood stasis sustained - Remember.
Marrowlands stasis critical - Remember.
Verdanian environment exceeded - Destined to forget.

Here is established, by holy consent of the Conductors,
The Memorium of Pharloom.
What Is Remembered Is Never Lost.
A rune depicting paths away from Pharloom.
Repair the Ruined Tool?
Grand Gate Map

Due to unacceptably high injury and unsanctioned deaths, Ventrica travel shall henceforth be denied to all.
For Pharloom eternal, a bug who serves must never die.
Weavenest Atla Map

Pilgrim
Spare a song for those who lay here silent.
By strength abandoned, they fell before the final ascent.
Abyss Map

entry.name: STEEL_QUEST_SPOT_3
entry.hpage: I understand now... The steel child’s servant grew bold...I know what the fleeing bug seeks to call, and their etchings here suggest clear clues to where. What they attempt is dangerous, stupid. It can only end badly. I must hurry if I’m to stop this.

entries.entry: An old rune displaying the design for a Weaver weapon.
A rune depicting the Abyss.

Sister, spider, sat between salt and stone,
Build those tools of brilliant mind imagined,
Aid us when our Silk has waned.
An old stone gate with a simple keyhole.

Sister, spider, husk bound to branch,
Watch over these bugs, passing safe,
Warded by fear,
No longer your meal.

Bug born of Pharloom. You have been chosen.
May our Citadel’s holy gilding harden your soft shell.Stand eternal as our arbiter, that no bug bearing sin shall ever step within our sacred halls.

I have departed to pay my respects at the graves within the great wood.
- Pinmaster Plinney
Take the map?

Penitent, First of the First.
Guilty of the sin of apostasy.
Penance by constriction.
Absolution denied.

Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, frail with age.
Tracked and taken in Sandsea Waste.
Seven Choristors, nine Envoys lost to task.
An outcrop of Magnetite.
Cloth and materials that could be fashioned into additional pockets.

Sister, spider, husk bound to moss,
Watch over these bugs born low,
Raised up by fervour fostered,
Born and caught within our web unknowing.

Sister, spider, if seeking commune with the creature atop this mount, take the climb above as test, a challenge beyond even our setting.Upon that summit gained, and creature hailed, know it shall choose what gift to grant, with death as likely as insight.
Hate for their light. Hate for their pins. For their waste poured thick and endless.Fill your hearts with hate, for power has now been claimed, and with it we shall punish.
Here we honour the seed that sprung the wood. By her grace may all bugs pass safe to join us and our song.
Putrified Ducts Map
A hardened outcrop of Voltridian.
Whiteward Map

Daughter of a distant land...
We who remained have waited long...
Bind our strength to yours...
Reclaim the future of our haunted kingdom...
If the haunted continue their work, leave them be! Only those who frustrate production shall be removed.
An inert automaton with an empty chest.

On the eighth harvest, send:
Fifty measures, nine beats dregthread, spooled,
Fourteen measures dregthread, twined,
Oath of fealty, all workers.On the twelfth harvest, send:
Forty measures dregthread, spooled,
Two beats fine thread, twined,
Oath of fealty, all workers.

In the air. The water. Everywhere.
Inside their shells. Twisted inside. Guts.Tightest around heart. Pulsing rhythm.
Sick. Alive. Dead?
Something worse.Deeper. Must look deeper.
A bucket overflowing with smouldering Flintstone.

Pilgrim
This settlement welcomes all who step the holy path.
May you ease your shell within, that your strength renewed can carry you higher.

Weaver of Pharloom.
By grace you warded. By thread you healed.
For your favour, eternal, we offer our song.
Expand Tool Pouch?
A crude map of the Underworks.
An ancient tuning mechanism.

O, great land whose flame doth falter!
Whose choir, conductors, all doth fail,Observe! Take heart! That spark still burning,
Yon butterfly of crimson grace,All bells shall peal, and voices raise,
When brave Trobbio steps, at last, upon the stage!

Erase our fear,
Eliminate our desire,To suffer no more,
Void, cleanse us.

I have departed to scale Pharloom’s frigid mount. If any bug exists brave enough to match my pin’s fatal resolve, then climb and face me upon its stormward side.
- Pinstress

Flickering Flame
Five masks swirled soul, brought and broiled.
Four stones rage-baked, crushed powder coarse.Three shells fresh from pilgrims fallen, to contain and age.

Weaver, in eighth part, last of their line, mortally wounded.
Tracked and taken in the Blackbarrens.
Four Choristors, one Reed lost to task.
A machine displaying a model of the Citadel.

entry.name: STEEL_QUEST_SPOT_2
entry.hpage: The second spot marked by the child of steel. This camp too was used by their vassal, and another rite was conducted here, this one incomplete. The action was clearly taken in haste. Did they believe themself pursued? The etchings here are crude, but the words are disturbing... and desperate.

entries.entry: Cloth and incendiary materials that could be fashioned into an explosive weapon.
Shellplates and cogs that could be fashioned into a flying automaton.

In silence your voice,
In darkness your form,We higher who see you seeking,
Our shells yearn for your embrace.

-ilgrim
You who have held tight to faith have been carried far.
This station shall offer brief rest to those devout.

Half-spawn of a distant land...
Within this cage I have waited...
Let my strength be bound to yours...
Reclaim the future of our accursed kingdom...
Child, I have answered the call to climb. I rise to join our elders in that holy place far above. May you, in time, grow strong enough to meet us there.
An old map of the Putrified Ducts.

This low, her gaze escaped.
Prepare, sisters. Weave hope anew.
That we might break free this accursed web born of our naive foundation.
An ornate door closed with a simple lock.
Insert Cogwork Heart?

Pilgrim
Accept the judgment of the rise beyond,
That all who stand at Pharloom’s holy crest prove pure of will and want.
Take map?

Two children born entwined, apart,
Two children marked to rule,They danced, they sang, proved blades beyond,
But none forgot their birth,For lovers born on beat exact shall be forever cursed.
Memorium Map

Great bugs! You who weep as your kingdom fades,
join me upon the Stage.
Together, we shall enflame the passion of Pharloom!
Cradle Map

entry.name: STEEL_QUEST_SPOT_1
entry.hpage: This location was marked by the steel child. This camp is old, but still shows clear evidence of an attempt at a rite.Whatever the vassal hoped to achieve here seems to have failed. The other marked locations may provide more clues to its intent.

entries.entry:
Weaver, in quarter part, last of their line, staked to service.
Tracked and taken beneath the City of Steel.
Eight Choristors, twelve Envoys lost to task.
Cogwork Core Map
By our Citadel’s glory, you treasured devout may bask brief in its holy light.
Choral Chambers Map
A husk with a map of the Slab etched upon its shell.
